string.name: phone_log_in_theme_detail
string.Data: "I've read and agreed to Themes' User Agreement and Privacy Policy, as well as Mi Account's User Agreement and Privacy Policy (for signing in using the system account)."

resources.string: A network error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
A server error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
1. All the orders (including paid orders) made on the Xiaomi devices. You will no longer be able to use the items you purchased.
2. All the information about your likes, comments, ratings, and followers generated on the Xiaomi devices.
5. All the personalization items currently used on this device. Default personalization preferences will be restored.
The following items will be deleted permanently after the services are canceled:
A network error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.

"1. Make sure that you have the right to cancel services before you continue. 2. Cancelation of Wallpaper and personalization services won't affect the normal usage of other Xiaomi products. 3. Service cancelation is an irreversible action. Back up all the important items before you continue, as they might be deleted permanently. Remember that you won't be able to reconsider your decision once the services are canceled. The following data will be permanently deleted or anonymized after service cancelation (except as otherwise provided by laws and regulations, or otherwise required by regulatory authorities):"

"All the orders (including paid orders) made on the Xiaomi devices. You will no longer be able to use the items you purchased. All the information about your likes, comments, ratings, and followers generated on the Xiaomi devices. All the wallpapers, fonts, and ringtones downloaded to this device. All the permissions preferences, settings, and cached items generated on this device. All the personalization items currently used on this device. Default personalization preferences will be restored."

"Looks like you haven't agreed to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy yet. However, the basic features and services of Wallpaper and personalization are still available to you. Whenever you use the items stored on this device for personalization (e.g. set them as wallpapers or ringtones), we'll ask you to allow this app to access device storage."
"You won't be able to keep using our unless you agree to the new version of Privacy Policy. Agree to the updated Privacy Policy now?"

"Looks like you haven't agreed to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy yet. However, the basic features and services of Themes are still available to you. Whenever you use the items stored on this device for personalization (e.g. set them as wallpapers or ringtones), we'll ask you to allow this app to access device storage."
3. All the themes, wallpapers, dynamic wallpapers, fonts, icons, and ringtones downloaded to this device.
4. All the search history records, permissions preferences, settings, and cached items generated on this device.

"1. Make sure that you have the right to cancel services before you continue. 2. Cancelation of Themes services won't affect the normal usage of other Xiaomi products. 3. Service cancelation is an irreversible action. Back up all the important items before you continue, as they might be deleted permanently. Remember that you won't be able to reconsider your decision once the services are canceled. The following data will be permanently deleted or anonymized after service cancelation (except as otherwise provided by laws and regulations, or otherwise required by regulatory authorities):"

"All the orders (including paid orders) made on the Xiaomi devices. You will no longer be able to use the items you purchased. All the information about your likes, comments, ratings, and followers generated on the Xiaomi devices. All the themes, wallpapers, dynamic wallpapers, fonts, icons, and ringtones downloaded to this device. All the search history records, permissions preferences, settings, and cached items generated on this device. All the personalization items currently used on this device. Default personalization preferences will be restored."
4. Service cancelation does not imply exemption or mitigation in regard to the responsibilities brought about by actions performed prior to canceling the services.
Statement on the Cancelation of Themes Services
Read and agree to the \"Statement on the Cancelation of Themes Services\" before canceling our services.

string.name: privacy_phone_read_theme_logoff_privacy_policy
string.Data: "I've read and agreed to the \"Statement on the Cancelation of Themes Services\"."

string.name: privacy_phone_read_theme_privacy_policy
string.Data: "I've read and agreed to the \"Statement on the Withdrawal of Consent to the Privacy Policy of Themes\"."

resources.string: 3. All the themes, wallpapers, dynamic wallpapers, fonts, icons, and ringtones downloaded to this device.
4. All the search history records, permissions preferences, settings, and cached items generated on this device.

"1. Make sure that you have the right to withdraw consent before you continue. 2. Your withdrawal of consent to the Privacy Policy of Themes won't affect the normal usage of other Xiaomi products. 3. Withdrawal of consent is an irreversible action. Back up all the important items before you continue, as they might be deleted permanently. Remember that you won't be able to reconsider your decision once your consent is withdrawn. The following data will be permanently deleted or anonymized after withdrawal of consent (except as otherwise provided by laws and regulations, or otherwise required by regulatory authorities):"

"All the orders (including paid orders) made on the Xiaomi devices where you used your Mi Account. You will no longer be able to use the items you purchased. All the information about your likes, comments, ratings, and followers generated on the Xiaomi devices where you used your Mi Account. All the themes, wallpapers, dynamic wallpapers, fonts, icons, and ringtones downloaded to this device. All the search history records, permissions preferences, settings, and cached items generated on this device. All the personalization items currently used on this device. Default personalization preferences will be restored."

"4. After you withdraw your consent to the Privacy policy of Themes, we will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. 5. Withdrawal of consent does not imply exemption or mitigation in regard to the responsibilities brought about by actions performed prior to the withdrawal of consent."
Statement on the Withdrawal of Consent to the Privacy Policy of Themes
Read and agree to the \"Statement on the Withdrawal of Consent to the Privacy Policy of Themes\" before withdrawing your consent.

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Themes. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As Themes provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept Themes services."
Agree to the terms and conditions first
"Read and agree to the new version of Privacy Policy before you continue."

All the information about your likes, comments, ratings, and followers generated on the Xiaomi devices where you used your Mi Account. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. 5. Withdrawal of consent does not imply exemption or mitigation in regard to the responsibilities brought about by actions performed prior to the withdrawal of consent."
